page.title: 09Drove Cottage page 2
page.content: A study and bathroom have been added on the ground floor of the house which has 5 bedrooms and two bathrooms upstairs; sitting room dining room and kitchen downstairs. Drove cottage is unusual because it has two known ghosts. Dr. Robinson is not a bit afraid of ghosts. She always hoped they would stay around longer. Dr Barbara Robinson and her daughter have seen one ghost a shape like a human being, but not very detaild. It looked like thick layers of grey mesh. Elderly people of Compton village say it is the ghost of a shepherd who never received enough wages and so he comes back looking for more money. The other ghost, a lady wearing nice clothes is supposed to hount the landing. Dr. Robinson has not seen the lady ghost.
